Package Piece

Class GearedObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • Piece.GearedObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rack, Ring, Track, TrackLayout, Wheel

    public abstract class GearedObject
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines all of the properties shared by any element with gears.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GearedObject(Geometry shape)
      Constructs a geared object from the given shape.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectTo(GearedObject peice)
      Creates a linking between the current peice and the parameter.
      SceneElement getSceneElement()
      Returns the inner geometery of the Geared Object

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GearedObject

        public GearedObject(Geometry shape)
        Constructs a geared object from the given shape. Sets the number of gears from the perimeter of the shape.
        Parameters:
        shape - the shape of the geared object. Determines number of gears.

    • Method Detail

      • connectTo

        public void connectTo(GearedObject peice)
        Creates a linking between the current peice and the parameter. If A.connectTo(B) is called, then B will rotate around A when drawn on a canvas.
        Parameters:
        peice - the piece to rotate around this piece.

      • getSceneElement

        public SceneElement getSceneElement()
        Returns the inner geometery of the Geared Object
        Returns:
        returns the encapsulated scene element. Used to define layouts on the canvas.
